scripts.mincss:
echo '=====> minify cs.css <======
' && cleancss cs.css -o cs.min.css
scripts.minjs:
echo '=====> minify cs.js <======
' && uglifyjs js/cs.js -o js/cs.min.js --verbose --timings
scripts.min:
echo '=====> minify all the things <======
' && npm run mincss && npm run minjs
scripts.open:
echo '=====> build, Start HTTP server & Opening in Browser <======
' && npm run min && sleep 3 && http-server ./ -p 1337 -oU -c-1
